about_the_game:
The demo includes all aspects of the final product with these modifications:
- Only the first map area of three is available.
- The player is locked to the first player character class out of four.
- Only one of the multiple music tracks of the final game is played.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains pixelated depictions of mutilated/hanged corpses and text descriptions of death.
